meanings.definition: A person or company that installs something, such as equipment or software.
meanings.sent1: The installer quickly set up the new computer for the office.
meanings.sent2: The installer arrived at the house to install the new air conditioning unit.
meanings.sent3: The installer accidentally installed the software on the wrong computer, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The installer of happiness brought smiles to everyone's faces with their efficient work.
meanings.sent5: The installer skillfully placed the security cameras around the building, ensuring safety.

meanings.definition: A program or utility that installs software on a computer.
meanings.sent1: After downloading the installer, I was able to install the new game on my computer.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to run the installer to properly set up the antivirus software.
meanings.sent3: The installer worked tirelessly to install all the necessary updates on the computer.
meanings.sent4: The installer acted like a diligent worker, carefully placing each piece of the software puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Using the installer made the process of setting up the new program a breeze.
